sentences.en: Art was created to uplift the mind and the spirit.
sentences.cn: 艺术创作旨在陶冶情操。

sentences.en: DX pile has a remarkable potential in uplift application.
sentences.cn: DX桩 (挤扩灌注桩)具有良好的抗拔特性和广阔的工程应用前景.

sentences.en: Early uplift, subject to the Bank's discretion and special handling charges.
sentences.cn: 定期存款到期前提取, 由银行酌情决定并按个别情况收取特殊手续费.

sentences.en: Her encouragement gave me a great sense of uplift.
sentences.cn: 她鼓励我激发了我的上进心.

sentences.en: His encouragement gave me a hot sense of uplift.
sentences.cn: 他的鼓励激发了我的上进心.

sentences.en: His moment of recessionary uplift may be about to pass.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退加剧的时刻可能将要过去.

sentences.en: Intermontane basins in relatively stable regions subjected to regional uplift.
sentences.cn: 较稳定区域内的山间盆地,曾有过区域隆起.

sentences.en: Sedimentation ceases: tilling or folding is accompanied or followed by uplift.
sentences.cn: 沉积间断,即掀斜或褶皱伴生或伴随着抬升运动.

sentences.en: She had been conscious of something faintly maternal in her efforts to guide and uplift him.
sentences.cn: 过去,她曾意识到自己尽力帮助他,鼓励他是出自朦胧的母爱.

sentences.en: Tall, stem loop does not uplift, leaves lanceolate, bamboo sheath hairy.
sentences.cn: 高大, 秆环不隆起, 叶披针形, 笋箨有毛.

sentences.en: This victory was a massive uplift for us.
sentences.cn: 这个胜利对我们来说是巨大的鼓舞。

sentences.en: Uplift and erosion at last produced the desert landscape we see today.
sentences.cn: 最后,地表抬升和侵蚀作用产生了我们今日所见的沙漠风貌.

sentences.en: Uplift is the upward pressure under a dam.
sentences.cn: 上浮压力指的是在坝体下面向上作用的压力.

sentences.en: We need a little something to help sometimes, to uplift us and make us feel better.
sentences.cn: 有时候，我们需要一些小东西来激励自己，使自己感觉更好。

words.tran_cn: 提高；抬起（uplift的过去分词形式）
举起，抬起；道德的向上；精神的高涨

trans.tran_cn: 举起，振作，（社会、道德等）发展，使上升
